title: Oktoberfest Munich: Large Beer Tent Entry+Table Lunch/Dinner
meeting_point:
Our meeting point is at the Italian restaurant Ristorante Ottantanove, located at Bayerstraße 89, just a 3-minute walk from Munich Central Station. There, you will receive your tickets and vouchers and meet your guide.

You are welcome to enjoy a pizza or a drink at the restaurant before the activity begins. Your guide will then accompany you on a 10–15-minute walk to your reserved Oktoberfest table. Along the way, there will be two short photo stops (skipped in case of large crowds): the first at the main Oktoberfest entrance, and the second in front of your booked beer tent.

title: Munich: Big Bus Hop-On Hop-Off Tour by Open-Top Bus
meeting_point:
Activate your mobile voucher or QR code at any Big Bus stop along the routes. Look out for the blue double-decker Big Bus or ask for “Münchener Stadtrundfahrten.” A recommended starting point is Stop 1 Karlsplatz 21, located next to the Buddy Hotel.

You can also board from any of the other stops along the route: 1. Karlsplatz, 2. Pinakotheken, 3. Odeonsplatz, 4. Eisbach / English Garden, 6. Marienplatz / Tal, 7. Max-Joseph-Platz, 8. Nymphenburg Palace, 9. Olympic Park / BMW Welt & Museum, 10. Schwabing.

title: Munich Nymphenburg Palace & Carriage Museum Fast-Track Tour
